department.dept_long_name: Department of Molecular and Cellular Biology

course.title: The Power and Pitfalls of Genetical Thinking
course.faculty_text: Nancy Kleckner and David A. Haig
course.description: An advanced treatment of heredity, including genetic, epigenetic and evolutionary aspects, as manifested in organisms from bacteria to man. Emphasis will be placed on how analytical genetic thinking and approaches can be applied to fundamental biological questions. Course format will include lectures, reading of the primary literature, student group projects and a final paper. Suitable for students in either the physical or biological sciences.
